author: cnbc.com
title: Matthew Gagalis Joins Pri-Med Educational Development Team
text:
BOSTON, Feb. 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Matt Gagalis, a healthcare executive, was named General Manager, Continuing Medical Education Programs of DBC Pri-Med, LLC, a division of Diversified Communications, located in Boston, MA, that provides the latest medical education to primary care clinicians. Previously, Matt held leadership positions at RxAnte, an advanced healthcare analytics and clinical services company, and Dovetail Health, a population health management organization.
"Pri-Med is a leading provider of continuing medical education, and offers a suite of educational offerings that deliver world-class content to help providers deliver better patient care," said Gagalis. "I am excited to join an impressive management team and a talented group of clinical educators and medical education professionals to further leverage Pri-Med's unique capabilities to impact healthcare outcomes."
In his role, Matt will collaborate closely with Pri-Med's medical and operations teams as well as potential grantors to develop multi-channel curriculum-based programs that improve clinical knowledge and support educational outcomes goals.
"Matt's experience in continuing medical education, healthcare analytics, and new trends in care delivery will bring important perspectives to our efforts to make CME more effective for clinicians and supporters alike," said DBC Pri-Med, LLC, President & CEO, Rick Watson.
Pri‐Med is an operating division of Diversified Communications. Based in Boston, MA, the organization has been a trusted source for professional medical education to over 275,000 clinicians since 1995. Through live meetings in over 30 U.S. cities and digital activities at Pri-Med.com , clinicians rely on Pri‐Med for opportunities to engage with local peers, meet internationally renowned faculty, and participate in world‐class educational activities. For more information, visit: http://www.pri-med.com/about
Diversified Communications is a leading international media company providing market access, education and information through global, national and regional face-to-face events, digital products and publications. Diversified serves a number of industries including: healthcare, technology, business management, natural and organic, food and beverage and commercial marine. Based in Portland, Maine, USA, Diversified has divisions in the Eastern United States, Australia, Canada, Hong Kong, Singapore and the United Kingdom. For more information, visit: http://www.divcom.com
